attributes.action: A vote for all British Citizens on the Scottish Independance Referendum
attributes.additional_details: In the event of a future referendum on Scottish Independance, whatever form it may take, ALL citizens of our nation should be allowed to decide it's future; United or Divided - Those eligible to vote should be; ALL British Citzens resident in the United Kingdom; Commonwealth Citizens resident in the United Kingdom; Service/Crown personnel serving in the UK or overseas in the armed forces or with Her Majesty's Government who are registered to vote in the UK; Members of the House of Lords resident in the United Kingdom
